testimonials.name: Raka Pratama
testimonials.desc: “Rachmizard is a developer with a good manner and highly motivated to finish his responsibility. He is encouraged to learn more and to better. He easily absorbs the direction given to him, and finish it with a good result. ”

testimonials.name: Mochammad Fiqri Jungjunan
testimonials.desc: “I've worked with him on a lot of sprints, the speed and accuracy of his work is really cool. Javascript expert, especially Angular.”
